content:
{"name": "Catholic Charities- Burlington Community Services Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "You must renew your household information to receive ongoing Food Pantry, Clothing Closet merchandise, and to be eligible for holiday events.


You need to bring:

*Birth Certificate or Proof of Date of Birth
*Proof of Income
*Proof of Residency (Lease)
*Names of all household members
*Social Security Cards of all household members
*Birth Certificate or Proof of Date of Birth of all household members", "email": "", "url": "https://www.catholiccharitiestrenton.org/services/housing-food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "450-460 Veterans Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Burlington", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08016", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0758182, "longitude": -74.8682828}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 764-6940", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID  – Primary Participant (Green Card or Passport)"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of Residency (Lease contract)"}]}
